snippet.title: Battle Run Trailer
snippet.description:
iOS - http://bit.ly/battleruniOS
Android - http://bit.ly/battlerunGP
Kindle - http://bit.ly/battlerunAK

Pick up a mystery weapon to shoot down whoever trying to run past you. Summon your trusty pet if you fall behind. Can you run to the finish line first, to laugh at your friend in the face? 

๏ REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER 
Playing with your friends' score is boring. Battling with them in real time is awesome. 

๏ ARSENAL OF WEAPONS 
Missile, Chainsaw, axe, landmine, meteor, and many more weapons to hurt other players real bad. 

๏ CUSTOMIZE YOUR LOOK 
Customize your own set of cloth, hat, glass, mask, or even trailing effect. SUIT UP to look unique in the game! 

๏ PRO LEAGUE 
Climb up the ranking and be the best possible battle runner in the world! 

๏ CROSS PLATFORM 
Doesn't matter which smartphone/tablet you have. Everyone can play, together.
